title: Small items I've enjoyed making
description: The joy of the intricate and the pleasure of handling small wooden objects.

title: Custom projects for friends and clubs
description: The work often has more meaning for me when it's in service to others.

title: Shopmade tools, jigs, and accessories
description: Sometimes you need something to help you make other somethings. Or store some things.

title: Models and proof of concept
description: If you test with workpieces, you may learn how to make it better.
